---

**Title**: 
Psychological Risk Assessments Services 

**Reference Number**: 
cb-590-85795303

**Solicitation**:
The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a qualified provider to offer psychological risk assessments services to offenders housed at Dorchester Complex. 

**Service Description**
The CSC Health Services require the services of a psychologist for offender risk assessments. The successful tenderer will provide comprehensive psychological risk assessment services to offenders, including:

* Administering standardized psychological tests and assessing clinical risk
* Providing reports detailing offender assessment, with specific recommendations for treatment and offender rehabilitation
* Conducting case consultations and providing written summaries of offender’s risk assessment, including proposed interventions and outcome measures
* Conducting risk assessment interviews for offenders

**Services Required**:
The successful tenderer will provide the following services:

* Conduct risk assessments and provide detailed written reports to the CSC, Project Authority, and designated CSC staff
* Consult with CSC staff to provide input on offender risk assessments and individualized treatment plans
* Participate in training sessions and workshops to enhance knowledge of CSC policies and best practices
* Provide consultation services to the CSC as per their discretion, including case consultations and psychological risk assessments

**Package Information**:
The contract will be awarded for one (1) year with the option to extend for a period of two (2) years. The successful tenderer will be required to demonstrate strong knowledge of psychological theory, evidence-based practice, and adult learning principles. 

**Estimated Value of Contract**:
The estimated value of the contract is [provided on the procurement document].

**Method of Procurement**:
Only those who have achieved (or are willing to work towards achieving) Level 3 (DBE) certification will be allowed to bid on this procurement.

**Current Solicitation Closing Date**: 
2024-07-03T13:00:00

**Location of Work**:
The location of the work is at the Dorchester Complex, located at [provided on the procurement document].

**Required Supports**: 
The following support services are available to support service users:

* Clothing
* Personal assistance with medication management and personal care

**Pre-Contract Requirements**:
In order to be considered a viable candidate, the potential bidder must:

* Be certified in and able to provide Level 3 (DBE) support services

The successful bidder will be required to provide exemplary services to the CS.

**Procurement Details**
Details of this procurement can be obtained on the government website.
